citations.narrative:
The program of veterinary care states that the licensee will evaluate all dogs in the kennel for healthy and unmatted hair
coats, properly trimmed nails, clean and healthy eyes, ears, skin and teeth on a weekly basis. These checks are not
being done by the licensee at this interval. The licensee must follow the program of veterinary care as specified by the
attending veterinarian in order to ensure the dogs remain healthy.
Correct by: 3/29/23
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
End Section

narrative:
3.13(a)(4) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
The program of veterinary care states that the licensee will evaluate all dogs in the kennel for healthy and unmatted hair 
coats, properly trimmed nails, clean and healthy eyes, ears, skin and teeth on a weekly basis.  These checks are not 
being done by the licensee at this interval.  The licensee must follow the program of veterinary care as specified by the 
attending veterinarian in order to ensure the dogs remain healthy. 
Correct by:  3/29/23 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
End Section
